This is the design of an Interior portable House by Joaquin Atienza, it has a kitchen with a table, a bedroom, a living room and two barthrooms, plus some elements of decoration as the TV, an aquarium and the curtains.
-This design is ment to be for a portable mini-home, the hole design was done in SketchUp, the aplication is really easy to use, especially after watchin some Linda videos, I especially recomended this channel.

-I first decided to use a blue color for the worlds but once I realize almost in all of them there is a yellow them ( at least in both the places I been living in New Zealand) ,so once the interior colo was design I stared designing the rest, at first I just put the elements in trying to save the space so the static bases are respect, here is my first design.


Obviusly there where a lot of elements missing, such as the kitchen, bathrooms or even the rooms, but the colors seem to work for me so I Start designing some rooms.
- One room for the kithen with the proper kitchen table, the stove and the refrigerator, also a door that connects the entry with the kitchen, I always wanted to have a door throught the kitchen, so the first and last thing you smell from your place is ment to be the best.
- I have also added some bathroom, as my flats in New Zealand there is one room for the toilet and another for the shower and mirror.
- The living room was instaciated to.
This is my second design




-Once the second phase was done I started to build the extra material as the roof, which almost all portable houses have. I also design the wheals for the house to be transported (it´s a portable house).The last thing I add where some details, such as the fish to make sure the reader understand is an aquarium, such as the curtain or chairs.

Sorry for making to many walls, it´s not easy to see the full design so you might need to move a little. Sorry.

This is my work, I hope you enjoy it.
